1.definition: of, relating to, or consisting of physical matter

2.definition: being of real importance or consequence

3.definition: being an essential component [the terms of the contract]

4.definition: being relevant to a subject under considerationbeing such as would affect or be taken into consideration by a reasonable person in acting or making a decision see also
